review: I wasn't sure if this would be something I would use but I gave it to myself for Christmas. Haven't used it a lot over the holidays but what I have watched I have enjoyed. Great product!

review: It's only OK. I was led to believe that my Prime Membership would include mucho first-run flicks. Such was not they case.It looks, to me, like the only freeby's are the movies that no-one wants to watch, anyway.
